metadata.description: 1-several lines missing or 1 method in class

questions.description: Implement the add method in an IntSet2ToIntSet1Adapter that adapts IntSet2 operations to IntSet1 interface
hints: Use unionWith with a singleton set
IntSet2Impl.singleton creates a set with one element
context_chunks: Lecture 17 The Adapter Pattern - unionWith method

questions.description: Implement the member method that checks if a value exists in the adapted set
hints: A set is a superset of {x} if and only if it contains x
Use isSupersetOf with a singleton
context_chunks: Lecture 17 The Adapter Pattern - member method

questions.description: Implement the iterator method that returns an iterator over the adapted set's elements
hints: IntSet2 has an asList() method
List has an iterator() method
context_chunks: Lecture 17 The Adapter Pattern - iterator implementation

questions.description: Implement the remove method for the EnumeratorIterator adapter that wraps an Enumeration
questions.expected_answer: throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot remove from Enumeration");
hints: Enumeration doesn't support removal
UnsupportedOperationException is the documented response
context_chunks: Lecture 17 The Adapter Pattern - Enumeration adapter

questions.description: Implement the constructor for TicTacToeConsoleController with null validation
hints: Validate parameters are not null
Throw IllegalArgumentException for null inputs

questions.description: Implement the main method that creates and starts a TicTacToe game with console I/O
questions.prefix:
public class Main {
  public static void main(String[] args) {
hints: Use InputStreamReader to wrap System.in as Readable
Create controller then call playGame with a new model

questions.description: Implement a JUnit test that verifies add() makes an element a member of the set
hints: Use assertTrue to verify boolean condition
member() returns true if element is in set

questions.description: Implement a test that verifies the constructor throws IllegalArgumentException for negative hours
hints: Use assertThrows with exception class
Lambda contains the code expected to throw

questions.description: Implement the chooseMove method for a random TicTacToe strategy
hints: Pick a random index from available moves
random.nextInt(n) returns 0 to n-1

questions.description: Implement the isSupersetOf method by iterating through the other set's elements
hints: Check if every element of other is in this set
Return false immediately if any element is missing

questions.description: Implement the member method for InstrumentedIntSet using delegation
hints: Simply forward the call to the delegate
No additional logic needed for member

questions.description: Implement the move method for SimpleTurtle that updates position based on heading
hints: Use trigonometry to calculate x and y components
Math.toRadians converts degrees to radians

questions.description: Implement the default constructor for TicTacToeModel that initializes the board
hints: Create a 3x3 array of Player
X typically goes first

questions.description: Implement a test verifying that remove actually removes an element
hints: After removal, member should return false
Use assertFalse for negative assertions

questions.description: Implement the unionWith method in the class adapter
hints: Iterate through other's elements
Add each element to this set

questions.description: Implement toString for Duration that returns the HH:MM:SS format
hints: asHms() already returns the formatted string
toString can delegate to existing methods

questions.description: Implement the @Before setup method for Duration tests
questions.expected_answer:
day = new HMSDuration(24, 0, 0);
    ninetySeconds = new HMSDuration(0, 0, 90);
hints: Initialize test fixtures with known values
90 seconds should be auto-canonicalized to 1:30

questions.description: Implement the turn method for SimpleTurtle
hints: Simply add the angle to current heading
No trigonometry needed for turning

questions.description: Implement compareTo for Duration based on total seconds
hints: Compare by total seconds
Long.compare handles the comparison correctly

questions.description: Implement differenceFrom method that removes all elements of other from this set
hints: Iterate through other's elements
Remove each element from this set
